channel.title: Bounty Hunter 317 Open Source Godsword Stance/Perfect D Claws
channel.description:
First of all Credits are as follows: 80% Owner Fritz 10% MoparScape Tutorials 10% Me. [b]If pictures don't work use this link:[/b] http://img10.imageshack.us/i/2hbh.png/ Server and Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=4736acc99a3224dd67cd7f7bd65f7eefe04e75f6e8ebb871]http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=4736acc99a3224dd67cd7f7bd65f7eefe04e75f6e8ebb871[/url] Ok. Basicly I downloaded Exrendum, a brilliant source with Bounty Hunter and edited it for all the Bounty Hunter lovers out there. Don't flame, if you don't like Bh its cool. I quitted RS when Bh left, after Bounty Worlds where introduced there wasn't a single place where you could get the full loot of a kill.
[b]Features[/b] You start in this Small Cave. It has 3 Bounty hunter Crater Entrances, a Banker, An Altar, an ancient magicks altar and a Lunar Altar. [img]http://img41.imageshack.us/i/homeps.png/[/img] Full 2H Stances. Not only Godswords but your average 2h is held properly, blocks properly and attacks Properly. [img]http://img10.imageshack.us/i/2hbh.png/[/img] Full Bounty Hunter. If you kill someone who isn't your target you get the pickup penalty, if you pickup stuff with the penalty you get a can't leave penalty. 180 seconds respectively. If you exit Bounty Hunter your drop will dissapear. The coloured skull will be assigned on entry depending on how much wealth you are carrying. I made Bh multi combat because it was too easy to survive a penalty against one hunter. [img]http://img527.imageshack.us/i/72086311.png/[/img] [img]http://img41.imageshack.us/i/51094428.png/[/img] All the teleports but 3 teleport you to the Bounty Hunter lounge which is a closed off area. I edited shop stocks to make it more realistic. If you die with a minigame item your opponent wont see it on drop. [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/i/minigames2.png/[/img] Corporeal Beast [img]http://img75.imageshack.us/i/corp.png/[/img] Godwars [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/i/godwars.png/[/img]

Isn’t that what everyone does? And i did try to add picturs, idk why they dont show up.[/quote] no actually u didnt edit all that and usually ppl do more, not just add their name to the chat box

item.title: Bounty Hunter 317 Open Source Godsword Stance/Perfect D Claws
item.dc:creator: @Runebeta2 Runebeta2
item.description:
@Runebeta2 wrote:

First of all Credits are as follows:
80% Owner Fritz
10% MoparScape Tutorials
10% Me.
If pictures don’t work use this link: http://img10.imageshack.us/i/2hbh.png/
Server and Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=4736acc99a3224dd67cd7f7bd65f7eefe04e75f6e8ebb871
Ok. Basicly I downloaded Exrendum, a brilliant source with Bounty Hunter and edited it for all the Bounty Hunter lovers out there. Don’t flame, if you don’t like Bh its cool. I quitted RS when Bh left, after Bounty Worlds where introduced there wasn’t a single place where you could get the full loot of a kill.

Features
You start in this Small Cave. It has 3 Bounty hunter Crater Entrances, a Banker, An Altar, an ancient magicks altar and a Lunar Altar.

Full 2H Stances. Not only Godswords but your average 2h is held properly, blocks properly and attacks Properly.

Full Bounty Hunter. If you kill someone who isn’t your target you get the pickup penalty, if you pickup stuff with the penalty you get a can’t leave penalty. 180 seconds respectively. If you exit Bounty Hunter your drop will dissapear. The coloured skull will be assigned on entry depending on how much wealth you are carrying. I made Bh multi combat because it was too easy to survive a penalty against one hunter.


All the teleports but 3 teleport you to the Bounty Hunter lounge which is a closed off area. I edited shop stocks to make it more realistic. If you die with a minigame item your opponent wont see it on drop.

Corporeal Beast

Godwars
